definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua

sentences.english: Welcome to Hema News. The lastest and finest Chinese News.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎來到河馬新聞，最熱門最嚴肅的華語新聞。

sentences.english: Ms Stefanie Sun burst onto the Chinese music scene with her eponymous debut album in 2000.
sentences.chinese: 孫燕姿在2000年憑藉同名專輯進入華語樂壇。

sentences.english: I wanted to practise my Mandarin.
He has become one of the many new songwriters and musicians revolutionizing the Chinese-language music industry.
sentences.chinese: 他是衆多改革華語音樂的創作歌手中的一位。

sentences.english: The great Eason Chan, another legend in the Chinese scene.
sentences.chinese: 優秀的陳奕迅，華語世界的又一傳奇。

sentences.english: Ming Chuan University Mandarin Studies & Culture Center.
sentences.chinese: 銘傳大學華語訓練中心課程申請表。

sentences.english: Designed for Chinese speakers to learn English with mind maps.
sentences.chinese: 爲了華語人士設計的腦圖，學習英語。

sentences.english: Wang Lee Hom is one of the best male artists in Chinese pop music.
sentences.chinese: 王力宏是華語流行樂壇最出色的男藝人之一。

sentences.english: Wang has established himself as a versatile musician in the Mando-pop scene.
sentences.chinese: 在華語歌壇，王力宏一直被認同是多才多藝的。

sentences.english: More and more foreigners learn Chinese is because of Chinese words.
sentences.chinese: 越來越多外國人學習華語是因爲中國字。

sentences.english: Since 2006 also have acted as the jury of Chinese Film Media Award.
sentences.chinese: 2006年起任華語電影傳媒大獎評委。

sentences.english: The Kittelsons began Mandarin language study in the fall of 1992.
sentences.chinese: 邱福生牧師夫婦於一九九二年秋季開始學習華語。

sentences.english: Intermediate and Intermediate High Levels will be available, starting from the summer 2006.
sentences.chinese: 華語中級及中高級班將於夏季陸續開課。

sentences.english: Altogether ten Chinese language films were shown at the festival.
sentences.chinese: 一共有10部華語電影在柏林電影節中上映。

sentences.english: This thesis presents a research on recognizing the retroflex and non- retroflex speech sounds for Mandarin Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 本論文是針對華語捲舌音與非捲舌音辨識之研究。

sentences.english: The two languages are playing a more and more important role in the ethnical communication.
sentences.chinese: 英語和華語在族際交流中發揮了越來越大的作用。

definition: China, Taiwan, Hong Kong and Macau (media term used esp. since 1997)
to rely on/to depend on/by means of/thanks to/sth that one relies on/also written 憑借|凭借[ping2 jie4]
to get past the qualifying round/to make it to the finals

Chinese language (Mandarin), emphasizing its national nature/Chinese as a primary or secondary school subject/Chinese in the context of the Nationalist Government/Guoyu, book of historical narrative c. 10th-5th century BC
